sentences.sContent: The worst reason to launch an attack would be a fear of seeming irresolute.
sentences.sCn: 发起攻击最坏的理由就是因为害怕看起来犹豫不决。

synos.tran: 优柔寡断的；踌躇不定的；无决断的

remMethod.val: ir (不) + resolute (坚决的) → 不坚决的 → 犹豫不决的

trans.tranCn: 优柔寡断的；踌躇不定的；无决断的
trans.tranOther: Someone who is irresolute cannot decide what to do
